snippet: The detention of three activists in the last few days sent a ripple of dread through Sri Lanka’s human rights organizations.
abstract: Fears of broad crackdown against rights activists in Sri Lanka are heightened after Sri Lankan police arrest prominent human rights advocates Ruki Fernando, Rev Praveen Mahesan and Jeyakumari Balendran.
